main event: An Air Force ground radar station in Tanganyika, East Africa, tracked a UFO in November or December 1962.
interesting points: The UFO made a sudden 90-degree turn slightly east while accompanied by a cloud., The sky was overcast during the observation., The object was not visually identifiable due to weather conditions., The length of observation was not reported., The report included various conclusions, indicating possible explanations like balloon, aircraft, or meteor.
witness description: The witness described seeing a light in the sky that was moving rapidly and emitting a buzzing sound.
